r.d: Support for YAML 1.1 (YAML Ain't Markup Language) serialization using the LibYAML library.
r.n: New Features: - Removed "not yet implemented" warning and deliberate abort from yaml_emit_file() Bugs Fixed: - #61770 Crash on nonunicode character - #61923 Detect_scalar_type() is not aware of base 60 representation - #63086 Compiling PHP with YAML as static extension fails - #64019 Segmentation fault if yaml anchor ends with a colon - #64694 Segfault when array used as mapping key
